Name: Bluethunder Weasel
Desc: These intelligent weasels live underground within the mining tunnels and cavernous depths of The Chasm. Their fur has a unique blue sheen.\nHaving long become used to life in the darkness, they now have excellent hearing and olfactory senses.\nNow that they are in The Realm Within, these weasels nonetheless prefer areas not bathed in as much piercing sunlight. Tubby sometimes makes use of their keen senses to find some lost objects.
